# ccAddresses

**Instance Property**

An array of email addresses for the secondary recipients of the message.

## Declaration

```swift
var ccAddresses: [MEEmailAddress] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property corresponds to the Cc header in the message.

The entries in the array specify the email addresses only, and don’t include any additional text. For example, if the Cc header in the message includes `Maria Ruiz <mruiz2@icloud.com>`, the array contains `mruiz2@icloud.com`.

## Accessing the Sender and Recipients

- **fromAddress**: The sender’s email address.
- **toAddresses**: An array of email addresses for the primary recipients of the message.
- **bccAddresses**: An array of email addresses for the concealed tertiary recipients of the message.
- **replyToAddresses**: An array of email addresses to use when replying to the message.
- **allRecipientAddresses**: An array of email addresses for all recipients of the message.
